NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
PYE: Poke, thank goodness you're here! We're positively lost: is this not the method of entry into the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station?</color>
2 1
POKE: What? Of course not, Pye! To travel into the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station,</color> you will need to journey to a new warp pad constructed on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep.</color>
3 1
POKE: But is there some sort of event happening today? Why are the two of you visiting there suddenly?
4
3
IDAEA: Have you not heard, Poke? Today is the day of the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station's</color> test! We are already running terribly late!
5
4
IDAEA: Using energy from the electric core of <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep,</color> the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> will soon test the mechanisms of the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project's</color> negative time interval!
6
4
PYE: Wait.. There may be hope for us yet, Idaea: I recall seeing a projection stone to the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> somewhere on the <color=orange>Sun Station's catwalk!</color>
7
6
POKE: In that case, there's no time to waste! Let us return to the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> at once to locate that projection stone, my friends!
SS R1 7
SS R2 6
GD Tower EX2 5
GD Tower EX3 2
CONV R1 5
